channel.title: we on Gaveen Prabhasara
channel.description: Recent content in we on Gaveen Prabhasara

item.title: We are on our own
item.description: I’m early to work, because the roads are mostly empty. That’s not because of an extended holiday season. No, that finished last week. People are trying to stay home because of the Easter Sunday Attacksâ€”they are uncertain where to go from here. As I type these words away, I’m but a walking distance away from Mahawela Gardens, where one gruesome episode of Sunday’s events took place. I also hear stories in the background about colleagues who have lost family members.
